name: PitFight
description:
PitFight is a MOBA game, taking inspirations on games like Battlerite, DotA 2, League of Legends. Create your room, call your friends, choose between four characters and fight to victory! It was completed in 3 months.

Project made by students in Universidade Feevale.

Coding: Junior Mercker, Mateus Fernandes;

Models: Arthur Schilling, Wesley Trindade;

UI Artists: Arthur Schilling, Mateus Fernandes.
